ilog.opl

Class IloCustomOplDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • ilog.opl.IloOplDataSource
      • ilog.opl.IloCustomOplDataSource

  • public abstract class IloCustomOplDataSource
extends IloOplDataSource
    This is the base class for custom data sources. You need to subclass this to implement your own data sources.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IloCustomOplDataSource(IloOplFactory oplEnv)
      As all OPL objects, your data source needs a factory to be created.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void customRead() 
      IloOplDataHandler getDataHandler()

        end, getDataSourceName

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • IloCustomOplDataSource

        public IloCustomOplDataSource(IloOplFactory oplEnv)
        As all OPL objects, your data source needs a factory to be created. Your subclass must call this constructor, giving it the OPL factory.
        Parameters:
        oplEnv - the OPL factory
